    addCreateChatOnResponseCallback(Consumer) - Method in class app.networking.Client

    Sets a callback function which will be called after the server's response on a GET_CHATS request.

    Sets a callback function which will be called after the server's response on a GET_MESSAGES request.

    Adds a server response callback on GET_QUEUED_MESSAGES API method
    addJoinChatOnResponseCallback(Consumer) - Method in class app.networking.Client
    Sets a callback function which will be called after the server's response on a JOIN_CHAT request.
    addLoginOnResponseCallback(Consumer) - Method in class app.networking.Client
    Sets a callback function which will be called after the server's response on a LOGIN request.
